title: Fragment, 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: supplementary warp pile (velvet), cut and uncut
provenance: from the Richard Cranch Greenleaf Collection.
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Four fragments of cut and uncut silk velvet in small scale stylized patterns.
